attributes.action: stop the connection of water meters in England and Wales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In this day and age we think it is disgraceful that people should have to pay a meter just for the use of water. Water is a basic human right and whilst we understand there has to be some sort of tax on it, we feel these meters are a step too far and are either forcing people into more poverty or meaning they are too scared to use something which everyone needs to live.
